title: Bolognese ????
content:
A client of me uses a font called ‘Bolognese’ as a corporate font. This is the first time I've ever heard about the font (style guide of client). Can anyone tell me where I can buy it?

Thanks!!  
Bart

See screenshot of CI:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823033522im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Bolognese_6333.png)
author: BartDuall

comments.content: looks like [FF Tartine Script TF](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823033522/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_tartine_script/) by Xavier Dupré.

It looks like [FF Tartine Script TF](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823033522/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_tartine_script_tf/) except lowercase ‘z’.  
The ‘z’ is from [FF Tartine Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823033522/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_tartine_script/).

Probably, customized font.
I' think it's FF Tartine Script en mayby they have made e few small modifications… THANKS for the tip!!
